Class SpatialAgentGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • flocksimulator.domain.Generator
      • flocksimulator.domain.SpatialAgentGenerator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MockSpatialAgentGenerator

    public class SpatialAgentGenerator
extends Generator
    Generator implementation using the Bin-lattice data structure for faster querying of agents
    Author:
    peje
